description:
Try to add this with 'Supercalc' : 9.99+11.99+249.99+3.99+9.99+3.88+2.89+22.99
You will get :
315.71000000000004
If it can not add this correctly, can you trust the rest?
summary: Can not do simple math - like addition

description:
Yeah, it can't do right math with this example 9.99+11.99+249.99+3.99+9.99+3.88+2.89+22.99. 
I confirm that it's not only this program issue. I tried to do it in python and it gives the same strange result.

did you tried to calculate 9.99+11.99+249.99+3.99+9.99+3.88+2.89+22.99 on google's calculator ??? 

the result is 315.71 and supercalc also gives you 315.71000000000004. which rounds 315.71.

i dont know what's not right here ?
summary: This reply yo Jeff Benjamin's review about wrong calculation

description: I never tried it before and but I did last year.
summary: I think that it will help me teach for pretend

description: Trying for the first time, not going to recommend this. This software should only show numbers when you typing it not including the numbers.
summary: No letters prevention from entering the input data

description: The UI can be clunky and it is less feature complete as it should be for scientific mode. However, the main negative reviews stem from the fact that any computer cannot truly calculate floats, or numbers with a decimal point. This calculator doesn't truncate the results in an effort to create a more "scientific" experience but every computer will give you 315.71000[...]4 to the calculation from the other reviews, just most don't show it. See en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Floating-point_arithmetic#Accuracy_problems
Seems, most have given this more stars than less. I give it four.
summary: I like especially the age calculator
